reviews.review_msg: The final was ridiculous. After the questions which we only had two hours to complete he made us stay an extra 20 minutes holding up our IDs to the screen so he could check each ID personally. The silliest online final ive ever had. He also changed the exam time and didn't allow students who missed it to redo it. Not good
He is nice. But his class is really boring.
Very kind and passionate, but gets distracted easily and very very hard to understand. lecture notes and memorization are key and much more helpful than his actual lectures.
The course is interesting. Needs memories and be able to identify rules. Sometimes the concepts were confused.
Be Prepared to memorize 4.5  pages worth of Latin Roots. Tons of rule  sto memorize . lectures are very boring

He's lucky the course comprises mainly of rules which are not difficult to communicate. Whenever he explained WHY the rules existed, he defaulted to skit comedy using student volunteers but didn't actually communicate the point well. Rinse and repeat and you have every week of this course. Pay more attention to his notes than his speeches.
Very good prof. Must the best one for all linguistic courses. If you follow all the lectures you will be very successful.
Remember all the Latin Roots, look at this students question files and do the sample midterms, final and assignments that he gives you beforehand.
Excellent prof, very clear on why Linguistics and word study matter. Encouraging, optimistic and will convince you to fall in love with mortuae linguae (dead languages)
So funny. Assignment so easy, exam so very simple!
Textbook is not needed.If you can spend some time for memorizing the rules and the Latin roots everyday,A- is guaranteed. Go through his student questions is strongly recommended

He is the best, if only I was a better student to take advantage. By the end of the term he literally provided us with all necessary information for A+ grade. Assignments, midterms, quizzes and file with 250+ questions from students that he answered and complied together. It's easy course if you follow Yourie's guidelines and do H/W. 5/5 would rec.
Very energetic and humorous prof and explained things fairly well. Also very fair with his marking. Would take classes with him again.

Yourie is very passionate and patient, has the clearest notes with tons of examples. A great teacher overall. In Ling110, memorize those Latin roots as early as you can. That helps a lot in any of your works. Textbook and dictionary are not used a lot.
I got an A- for this class. Just memorize all the rules and Latin/Greek roots! I decided to major in Linguistics after taking this course.

Yourie is incredibly enthusiastic and more than willing to help with anything. He is also insightful and kind. I suggest speaking to him in his office hours. On multiple occasions we chatted for hours!
Very funny.A cute guy.passionate about what he teaches.really interesting.

pretty awesome prof.. yes indeed very enthusiastic but he has bad breath..attended all his lecs (but was often late) and i am glad that every lec was worth it! his exams are all well related to his notes and lecs (though he is traditional enough to still use overhead notes)
Really funny and enthusiastic. Good gpa booster, text book is important.
Extremely funny. Made the course very interesting, and had lots of review. final was much harder than the midterm though...
clear instructions for the assignments and the finals~it's an easy course you should take~

This class was HILARIOUS. Fairly easy material, so long as you pay attention to the examples he gives and memorize the rules. Pankratz is the most entertaining prof ever, though his accent makes him hard to understand sometimes. Final exam was way harder than the midterm though, watch out for that.

While this class is challenging, I highly recommend taking it with Dr. Pankratz. He knows what he's talking about, and responds to questions in lecture and via e-mail really fast. He gives lots of samples for EVERYTHING YOU DO and if you practice, you'll get a good mark. He gives you everything you need to know in lecture you just have to listen.

This class takes WAY too much work, it's not worth it. You gotta practise stuff over and over, people who say 'just memorize the rules' that doesnt work. That would be like saying take calculus and just memorize the formulas...
BEST PROF EVER..HE IS DA****

if ur taking ling 110, take it with pankratz cuz it really boosts gpa with him. He gives TONS of practice samples even for assignments and he also sends files containing student's questions and his answers to everyone. the material isnt hard at all n the exams r very similar to his samples n assignments.. i cud'v gotten A+ if i didn't slack so much

This class was easy. You just need to memorize the rules and you'll do well on the exams. There are two assignments that are worth 15%, they're easy because there are unlimited tries. He has an accent, I couldn't really understand during lectures. I got a B+ with 2 days of studying before the exams.
Easy class! just memorize the rules!

OMG This guy is hilarious!  I loved his lectures.  And he makes these awesome bird call noises that sound super realistic.  This class is not hard.  People try to scare you and make it seem like it's super difficult, but as long as you memorize the chart he gives you and pay attention in lecture and practice, practice, practice, there is no reason
No Comments

He is a nice guy, but sorry to say, he is not so good of an instructor.He abbreviates phrases to an extend that his notes are right next to being uncomprehendable. Also, his note are not frank nor informative. He gives great lectures, but he fails to keep some students focused. I also like how he posts questions he received from his students.

I'm sorry Dr. Pankratz, you're a pretty nice guy, but too bad that doesn't take the place of how crappy of a teacher you are. This guy doesn't explain anything. He says the same annoying phrases over and over and doesn't teach what needs to be taught. He's probably a smart guy but he's unable to deliver what he wants to say to the class. TERRIBLE

He is a nice person that's about it. You don't need to go to the lecture since it's totally useless. Just spend 2 days to memorize the rules and go through his sample finals, it would be extremely difficult to get a mark lower than B
BORING LECTURES, sometimes his lectures are really hard to understand as he got a heavy accent. Exams were a bit tricky, not an easy course unless you do your reading & practice assignments.

Pankratz is a cute man. I love him =3= anyways, his lectures are very boring. But he emails us student questions wif answers which are very helpful to our assignments and exams. Asking him questions directly is very helpful too. This course's materials are very easy to pick up. It's an easy A course.

Dr. Pankratz is an all right prof.  Make sure you attend the lecture because you really have to listen carefully in his lecture in order to understand the course material better. He also offers many office hours for you to ask question, which is quite nice. Many word structures to be memorized though.
perpare u r pillow, u will sleep on class..ZZZZZZZZ
easy material, nice prof,easy assignments, easy mid terms and finals.
ok prof, willing to help students, encouage questions, but lectures r boring!!  just study the courseware and u should do well~ easy A!

Incredibly helpful - made lists of common student questions and e-mailed them to everyone in the class. Just make sure you pay attention - he can make you feel pretty stupid if you ask a question that he thinks you should know the answer to!
Strange but memorable sense of humour. He's obvously got a real passion for the subject, and brings a lot of energy to his lectures.

Amazing prof! He uses innovative teaching and is very passionate about what he is conveying to you.  He prepares you well for both the midterm and the final.  Lectures are fun with him and he makes it easy to retain the important information

The way that he teaches is funny and interesting though the course overall is a bit dry. He is willing to help if u ask him questions after class. Tests and homeworks are not too hard though it requires a lot of memorization. Not the best prof that I've had but not a bad one either. I'll rate him B+
horrible teacher, cannot offer help or even understand his students

I am a Linguistics major and this course is said to be one of the easiest ones at SFU.  But I don't know why I found it difficult especially when we're asked to memorize those latin words etc... I think Ling 100 is more interesting except there more to memorize.
Super funny guy with a lot of passion for the subject.
I really don't know why a lotta ppl like him.  I found his attempts at humour SUPER irritating, and I didn't find the class very easy.
ok easiest crap ive had , not the best teacher but when wut yur teaching is useless bs then it doesnt matter how good u r! very dedicated in my views answering ALL Qs
A very very easy course to take with him..  My first "A" ever at SFU.
a genuinely nice guy. he was always very nice to students and tries hard to help. class is pretty easy.
A nice and very easygoing professor.  Midterm and finals are fair and relatively easy.  Too bad he isn't teaching next semester.  I would love to be in his classroom again.  BRAVO!!!!
lectures are BORING~! Sometimes the stuff he talks about are not in line with the courseware...overall assignments and exams are fair.. really need to memorize the "RULES"
Do not ever take Ling 110 with this prof! has no clue wat he's teaching...going all over da place..take it with McFretidge if u have to.
Easy Professor!!  Just read the courseware and you will do fine.. Trust me, this course isn't hard at all//
he doesn't help at all. read the courseware..

He has the clarity of a window smeared with excrement. His notes are a mess. Doesn't help that he's not helpful too. Also a very lame sense of humour. Jokes around but nobody laughs. Easy credit, but be ready for 3 months of absolute boredom.
No Comments

Pankrats is the worst prof ever! the course isn't hard but he just babbles on about feed back, don't waste your time going to his lectures, its all feedback, and  uh-oh-uh  its like he's thinking outloud!
No Comments
Prof was great, really engaging and funny and super quick to return emails. I wouldn't take this as your first Ling class, though. It really should have Ling 130 as a prereq.
No Comments
Don't go to class, as long as you want a warm room to sleep.  (P.S. it is not Wo Kao, It is Wo Cao which is more offical)

I don't understand why these people got so much upset about this Prof... This course is not damn hard... I guess just some crab first year students don't know what rules must be in university. Grow up! This is not high school!

Talks to himself in class. Always says 'Uh-Oh-Oh', which is extremely annoying. I could NEVER stay focused for more than 5 minutes. I went to like 3 lectures the whole semester, and stayed for like 5 minutes each. Read text and do previous exams.

easy course, not bad of a prof if you understand his accent, helpfulness good -> replies to emails and sets up answers to the questions most asked by students, exams are easy if you do the previous exams which are very similar, couse is easy as well...
I want to cry, but I try to smile :)

COURSE  WAS  TO BE EASY BUT VERY CONFUSING PROF. VERY VERY CONFUSING...DON'T GOT A THING WAT HE'S TRYING TO SAY...DOESN'T KNOW HOW TO TEACH...REALLY REALLY BAD! A REALLY BAD EXPERIENCE @ SFU....ALMOST FAILED THE COURSE!!!!
he doesn't know what a paradox is. he always wants to be in your shoes. he always says UH UH OH. he can't teach. suppose to be an easy course too.

He was the worst teacher I have ever had! He seems to know alot about language, but has horrible communication skills! He is rude and is a bad teacher! He also doesnt care if you are in the hospital and cant submit an assignment.
He just talks to himself. He can't teach. Better off reading the text.

Accent is hard to understand at times. Repeatedly talks to himself in class, says the same annoying phrases over and over again. And over again. I go to class but I can never stand more than 10 minutes with the guy.
What the heck is he talking about? It seems to me like he's having a conversation with himself. He can't explain a thing! Where have all the  teachers  gone?
Funny, enthusiastic and gives pretty good notes! His accent makes for a good time too.
what is he saying???  lectures suck, content is boring and he doesnt explain things very well!
easy course...
He is the type that makes Easiest course most boring and unclear. Yet course itself is extremely easy if u read. He often talks to himself inclass and his famous quote   uh ohoh !
is he still teaching??
Hilarious mannerisms.  Enthusiastic.  Into computational linguistics.
very boring lectures; his accent is very hard to understand
Easy Course
boring but nice!
Boring as hell, but easy course
